price: 74. (Xus, Nabiyow) markuu Ibraahiim ku yidhi aabbihii Aazar4: Ma waxaad ka yeelataa asnaam ilaahyo? Waxaan kugu arkaa adiga iyo qolodaadaba habow cad.
arabic: ۞ وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ ءَازَرَ أَتَتَّخِذُ أَصۡنَامًا ءَالِهَةً إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكَ وَقَوۡمَكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: 4. Mufasiriinta qaar waxay yidhaahdeen aabbihi ee lagu xusay Aayadda waxaa loola jeedaa adeerki, waayo adeerku waa aabbe oo kale.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qāla ib'rāhīmu li-abīhi āzara atattakhidhu aṣnāman ālihatan innī arāka waqawmaka fī ḍalālin mubīnin
